channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: After taking over the immigration operation in Minnesota three days ago, White House border tsar Tom Homan now says he is working with local leaders and law enforcement to mitigate problems the state has had in recent weeks. #TomHoman #Minnesota #Minneapo

item.title: Dr Arthur Joustra says his student loan debt keeps going up despite paying back about £250 a month. Chancellor Rachel Reeves has called the system "fair" and that graduates only start paying back when they "can afford to do so". #StudentLoans #StudentLoan
